Discussion

Frequently Asked Questions

Where does all of the conent come from?

While we supply most of the photos, video, and music. We also have people from all around the world submit their nature content.

Can I use content from Nature Break for personal use?

Yes! As long as you are using it strictly for personal use. We ask that if you wish to use our content on a commercial scale that you please contact out team.

I have suggestions about new features

We welcome any suggestions you may have. If you wish to see a certain feature implemented, please contact our development team to further discuss your idea at devteam@naturetime.org

How can I get my content featured on Nature Break?

If you would like to know to to get your content featured on our page visit the Apply page.

Is there a place I can donate to that supports nature conservation?

Yes! Our favorite organization is Friends of the Earth. They are a great organization that supports all things nature related.

Can I help develop Nature Break?

We are not currently looking for any more developers at the moment (this may change), but we are always looks for people to help us with translations.

Can I chat with other users?

We are currently working on a few social features for Nature Break. Our two main focuses are a chatting system and a rating system. Stay tuned for more updates.

How can I get involved?

The best way to get involved with nature is to find your nearest wildlife/nature reserve and volunteer your time. These places are always looking for extra help and you will most likely get to experience some beautiful nature.

If you have any other questions or would just like to discuss nature related topics feel free to contact our team at naturebreak@naturetime.org
